name: One-Life Blob
description:
Ever wonder what an alien blob does with its free time? What if it's not an advanced life-form and only has one life? I guess that one was a lie.

This game is something a bored university student like me would make during his spare time. It's not the best game ever, so don't judge too hard!

Download the .exe file down below instead of the .jar if it doesn't work for you.

Special thanks and credits to:

Kenney Vleugels and Robert for their wonderful sprites!

LittleRobotSoundFactory, ObsydianX, and DL Sounds for their amazing sound/music!
